page.title: 07Foulis Court,Colden Common
page.content: This is a non-denominational community set up in 1978 in a large Victorian house at Fisher Pond.At present it contains 14 members.They see their original foundation and their lives in the community as"an expression of God's will".The members see their role as providing a haven of peace and family life in a society where these values are increasingly threatened. Although not a"closed" community,they have few contacts with the village. The community is self-supporting.It runs a thriving nursery and landscpae gardening business in the 7 acres surrounding the house.Plants and shrubs are produced for sale at the house,at Marwell Zoological Park and by mail order.They also hve a painting and decorating business.
